revised_title: Corrigendum and Anniversary Address by Dr E. D. Adrian
tldr: This article contains a corrigendum for a previous publication and an address by Dr. E. D. Adrian, discussing the achievements and contributions of several scientists, including Paul Dirac's work on quantum mechanics, Fritz Zernike's development of phase-contrast microscopy, Christopher Ingold's research on organic reactions, and Sir Frederic Bartlett's work in experimental psychology.
